name: Plucker Channel Porter
short_description: PlkrData imports and exports Plucker channels between the web, the Plucker/Plucker Desktop INI format, and the JPluck .jxl XML format.  PlkrData can add channels from the web to Plucker with a simple point-and-click in your web browser.
